requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card supporting OpenGL 4.0 / DirectX 11 graphics hardware
  • DirectX: Version 11
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nivida Geforce GTX 980 / Radeon RX480 (or better)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution 1024x768
